1.0.0.name: wordpress/responsive-add-ons
1.0.0.description: This plugin has been designed specifically for Responsive but will also work on any theme. Wordpress is working with theme developers like CyberChimps.com to make sure that the theme's functionality is limited to design, layout and structure and that anything that falls outside of this is developed as a plugin. Hence the reason why this plugin has been developed.
